name: JWS Discount Display for WooCommerce
author: Jason William Saunders

sections.description: This plug-in for WooCommerce is designed to emphasize the value of sale items by displaying their relative (percent) or absolute (dollar) discounts in a visual, customizable way. The backend includes a real-time preview of how several powerful, but easy-to-use style settings will appear. It will be displayed anywhere product thumbnails are shown including categories, search results, related products, up-sells, and cross-sells. Optionally, it can appear in product detail sections.
sections.installation:
1. Settings located at WooCommerce > Discount Display
  2. Disabled by default. Must be enabled by using the ‘Enabled’ setting
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Settings located at WooCommerce > Discount Display
  2. Disabled by default. Must be enabled by using the ‘Enabled’ setting

short_description: Displays each sale product's dollar or percent discount.
